Html:
Hi, I always thank your help.

I am trying to draw a jpg image on groundmarker, but I don't know how to load jpg image.

Is there some examples to load jpg image??

This must be very easy if I know how to use  it,      :-D

What do you mean that you want to draw a jpg image on groundmarker? You want to overlay an image on top of a marker?

If so, you can simply place a rectangle polygon on top of the marker with texture that has your jpg image. 

For making custom shape with textures, see tutorial 7.

Ohan
